actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that a motion to suspend the rules and pass a bill or resolution shall not be in order if it makes or authorizes appropriations which may be in excess of $100,000,000 for any fiscal year.

summary.text: Amends rule XXVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that a motion to suspend the rules and pass a bill or resolution shall not be in order with respect to any bill or resolution which makes or authorizes appropriations which may be in excess of $100,000,000 for any fiscal year.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that a motion to suspend the rules and pass a bill or resolution shall not be in order if it makes or authorizes appropriations which may be in excess of $100,000,000 for any fiscal year.
